meanings.definition: A portable seat or stool used for camping or outdoor activities.
meanings.sent1: During the camping trip, we sat around the fire on our campstools.
meanings.sent2: The hikers brought their campstools to rest by the lake.
meanings.sent3: When the squirrel tried to use the campstool, it comically tipped over.
meanings.sent4: Her campstool was her throne in the wilderness, a symbol of comfort amidst nature.
meanings.sent5: The colorful campstools stood out against the green backdrop of the forest.

meanings.sent1: She loves to campstools by the river and watch the sunset.
meanings.sent2: We will campstools by the campfire and share stories.
meanings.sent3: The cat decided to campstools on the empty campstool, claiming it as its own.
meanings.sent4: In the silence of the night, he would campstools alone under the stars.
meanings.sent5: The old man would campstools in the same spot every evening, reminiscing about the past.
